languages.text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.
languages.original_text: Когда ассасин наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленной{/g} до конца своего следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin deals direct damage, the target must pass an Agility resistance test with a −<u>(2 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u> penalty or become slowed until the end of their next turn.
Whenever the Assassin deals direct damage, the target must pass an Agility resistance test with a −<u>(2 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u> penalty or become slowed until the end of their next turn.

Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

Whenever the Assassin deals direct {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

languages.text: 每当刺客造成{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}点减值。未能通过检定的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，直到该名敌人的下个回合结束为止。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当刺客造成直击{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于<u>（2×刺客的敏捷{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。未能通过检定的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，直到该名敌人的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。

每当刺客造成直击{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}。未能通过检定的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，直到该名敌人的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。

每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}时，目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，直到该名敌人的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。

languages.text: Cuando el asesino inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} hasta el final de su siguiente turno.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} hasta el final de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

Cuando el asesino inflige {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} directo, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización de{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} hasta el final de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: アサシンが{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、ターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}のペナルティを伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。失敗した場合、ターゲットの次のターン終了時まで移動{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度が低下{/g}する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、ターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}のペナルティを伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。失敗した場合、ターゲットの次のターン終了時まで移動{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度が低下{/g}する。

アサシンが直接{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、ターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}に合格しなければならない。不合格の場合はターゲットの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで移動速度が{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}低下{/g}する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、ターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を伴う{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。不合格の場合はターゲットの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで移動速度が{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}低下{/g}する。

languages.text: Когда ассасин наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленной{/g} до конца своего следующего хода.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда ассасин наносит прямой {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}, цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ЛВК ассасина)</u>. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленной{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда ассасин наносит прямой {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}, цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ЛВК ассасина)</u>. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленной{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда ассасин наносит прямой {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g}, цель должна пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедленной{/g} до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Assassine {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zufügt, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} überstehen. Ansonsten wird es {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, und zwar bis zu seinem nächsten Zug.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zufügt, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} überstehen. Ansonsten wird es {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, und zwar bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

Wann immer der Assassine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Direktschaden{/g} zufügt, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} überstehen. Ansonsten wird es {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, und zwar bis zu seiner nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'assassin inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff}, faute de quoi, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} directs, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'AGI de l'Assassin)</u> ou elle subit l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

Chaque fois que l'Assassin inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} directs, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} ou elle subit l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: Suikastçı her {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verdiğinde hedef, −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}. Bu etki bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next turn.
